title: Article Highlighter
shortDesc: Privacy-first Chrome extension to highlight text, add notes, and export highlights or full pages as PDFs.
longDesc: Article Highlighter is a lightweight, privacy-focused Chrome extension for marking important text on web pages, attaching notes, and exporting your research. It stores all data locally (no servers), supports per-page persistence, and offers two export options: full-page PDF with highlights and a concise highlights-only PDF. Replace this text with the full README if you prefer. (Source README used.)

title: Copy Code Cleaner
shortDesc: Adds a one-click "Copy Clean" button to code blocks so you copy code without line numbers or artifacts.
longDesc: Copy Code Cleaner intelligently detects code blocks (<pre>, <code>, etc.) and injects a 'Copy Clean' button. The cleaner removes line numbers, trims whitespace, decodes HTML entities, and offers options to preserve indentation. It's built as a tiny Manifest V3 Chrome extension with a configurable popup. (Source README used.)

title: LogTailer
shortDesc: Live console log aggregator for Chrome — tail logs across tabs into one dashboard.
longDesc: LogTailer aggregates console.log/info/warn/error messages from all open tabs into a single, real-time dashboard. It uses a content script + background service worker (Manifest V3) and provides filtering, export to JSON, and tab-based views. Ideal for debugging across multiple pages and localhost servers. (Source README used.)

title: NotebookLM PDF Exporter
shortDesc: Export NotebookLM notes into clean, formatted PDFs with smart pagination and citation cleanup.
longDesc: NotebookLM PDF Exporter lets you download notes from Google's NotebookLM as a clean PDF. It preserves headings/tables, removes interactive citation markers, and uses smart pagination to avoid cut-off content. Lightweight, Manifest V3 extension requiring minimal permissions. (Source README used.)

title: Pomodoro Focus Timer
shortDesc: Classic Pomodoro timer extension with customizable intervals, badge counter, and notifications.
longDesc: A lightweight Pomodoro extension providing a classic 25/5 workflow with customizable durations, long-break support, desktop notifications, and a visual badge counter. Built as a Manifest V3 Chrome extension with persistent state and a dark theme UI. (Source README used.)

title: Quick QR Code Generator
shortDesc: Instantly generate a QR code for the current page URL or any text and download as PNG.
longDesc: Quick QR Code Generator creates a QR code for the active tab URL or custom text. It includes a keyboard shortcut, real-time updates, and a download button for PNG export. Minimal permissions (activeTab) and a tiny codebase (qrcode.js). (Source README used.)

title: Terminal History (VS Code)
shortDesc: VS Code extension that logs integrated terminal commands & outputs for quick copy/paste.
longDesc: Terminal History captures every command and output from VS Code's integrated terminal and displays them in a sidebar. It offers quick-copy, status icons, and export options. This is a VSIX-style extension — the VSIX download is available in releases. (Source README used.)
